content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you get scheduled for electrical, plumbing, or HVAC support. May I ask your name to start your request?
Hey, uh, actually—not right now. I was going to schedule something but I’m gonna try sorting it myself first. Sorry about that.
reason: Customer decided to attempt repair themselves.

content: No problem at all! If you change your mind or need professional help, just let us know. Good luck with your electrical repair and have a nice day!
